name: SuperHeroShowdown
description: A full stack React Application, powered by MongoDB, that works to answer a simple question. Who would win in a fight? Simply pick to characters and start the showdown.

name: Google Books API
description: Built as a Single Page Web app using React, this application allows you to search Google Books and add items to your saved list. Great for saving books to read later, or even just to get a plot description

name: The Office
description: An Office Themed application, that functions as an employee managing system. Allows users to sort, and search through all of the Dunder Mifflin employees. Built using React.

name: Athlestat
description: A full stack React Application, powered by MongoDB, that aims to help highschool football coaches, create rosters, link with players, and manage statistics. This app is still in the development process but is by far the most complicated application I have made to date.
